__e: You're a two-faced liar, just like the rest of them.
So your solution is to make a liar out of me, after I told her that she could trust you?
Why do you tell these lies when you know I could kill you for them?
He's a liar and a murderer.
And you, Mrs. Allen, are a liar and a murderer.
Oh, so I'm a liar and a murderer. Is that it?
You're always teasing me and telling lies and I'm sick of it!
But I'm tired of all the lying and the sneaking around, so I will inform him that you can have whatever you like.
See, what happens is, you try to protect her with lies, and then it starts to add up.
I know you find that hard to believe, but he is.
You want to die a liar, that's fine by me.
To sit there... and listen to people tell lies?
What? What don't you believe? What?
But I would be a liar if I said to you I haven't felt it since.
What's she gonna say, huh? When everybody says her father's a liar or...

You see, I may be many other things, Sam, but I ain't no liar.
When someone's a liar, that's what you... you say.
